snippet: Mallory Hagan, an Alabama native who moved to New York several years ago, has embraced Brooklyn. But the borough’s residents don’t know what to think about a beauty queen in their backyard.
abstract: Mallory Hagan, Alabama native who moved to New York in 2008 and is newest Miss America, has embraced Brooklyn; still, borough’s residents do not know what to think about a beauty queen in their backyard.
lead_paragraph: Mallory Hagan, an Alabama native who moved to New York several years ago, has embraced Brooklyn. But the borough’s residents don’t know what to think about a beauty queen in their backyard.

headline.seo: Miss America Mallory Hagan Embraces Brooklyn
headline.main: Crowned Miss America 2013, Living in a Borough of Ms.
headline.print_headline: Crowned Miss America 2013, Living in a Borough of Ms.
